fr.sorbonne_u.alasca.examples.memory_allocation

Class MemoryAllocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.alasca.examples.memory_allocation.MemoryAllocation

  • public class MemoryAllocation
extends java.lang.Object
    The class MemoryAllocation illustrates the use of the Easy Rules library on an example where decisions are made about allocating more memory to a process when its memory consumption reaches thresholds in terms of percentage of the currently allocated memory that is actually used by the process.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2019-12-09

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
